news.title: New weather warnings issued as country braces for threat of ‘significant’ flooding; some schools decide to close early
‘Cristiano Ronaldo should be ashamed’ – The view from Lisbon as Portugal come under fire following Ireland’s World Cup win
news.summary: The media in Portugal have not held back in their criticism as they assessed Roberto Martinez and his side after their 2-0 defeat to Ireland in the World Cup qualifiers.

news.title: ‘Children sometimes have nightmares about monsters. I had a real-life monster’ – woman tells of devastating abuse by ‘pillar of the community’ Pat Salmon
news.summary: A woman who was abused by a “pillar of the community” as a five-year-old child has said that while young children sometimes have nightmares about monsters, “I had a real monster”.

news.title: Maeve McTaggart: What did past government housing plans promise – and what was actually delivered?
news.summary: The new housing plan has already been criticised as a “repackaging” of the one that came before it, with successive governments having attempted to tackle record homelessness and issues in delivery with a series of strategies.

news.title: Irish rock band pay tribute to Wexford woman who passed away in the Dominican Republic – ‘She lived life to the fullest’
news.summary: Irish rock band paid tribute to Wexford mother, Claire Cullen, following her death highlighting her musical talents.

news.title: Home economics: ‘My father fell out with our sibling years ago, then reconciled, but the will was never updated – can we give the sibling some of our share?’
School day’s over but a new life begins in this Skerries home
news.summary: The Old School House, Ballykea, Loughshinny, Skerries, Co Dublin

news.title: Qsuite dreams: What’s it like to fly business class from Dublin Airport with Qatar Airways?
news.summary: Nothing says luxury like a plane with its very own bar. Flying business class is boujie enough, but when you can get up out of your (lie-flat) seat, and hop on a stool for a glass of Champagne at 30,000 feet? Well, that’s next level.

news.title: Modern Morals: My best friend got drunk and behaved appallingly at my mother’s funeral and I can’t get past it
Man (45) charged with 2022 murder of Adnan Asic (60), who was attacked on late-night walk home
news.summary: A 45-year-old man charged with the murder of Bosnian national Adnan Asic in Blanchardstown, Dublin, just over three years ago, has been remanded in custody.
